description.fr:
<rem>{PropertyEffect:28}</rem>
\---
Lorsque vous infligez des dégâts à votre héros\_: Inflige {value:percentAtt,percent} de son {%AT} à l'adversaire ayant le plus de {%pv,plural:other}.
description.en:
<rem>{PropertyEffect:28}</rem>
\---
When you do damage to your hero: Inflicts {value:percentAtt,percent} of their {%AT} on the opponent with the most {%pv,plural:other}.
description.es:
<rem>{PropertyEffect:28}</rem>
\---
Cuando infliges daños a tu héroe: Inflige un {value:percentAtt,percent} de su {%AT} al adversario que más {%pv,plural:other} tenga.
description.de:
<rem>{PropertyEffect:28}</rem>
\---
Wenn du deinem Helden Schaden zufügst: Fügt dem Gegner, der die meisten {%pv,plural:other} hat, {value:percentAtt,percent} seines {%AT,plural:two} als Schaden zu.
description.pt:
<rem>{PropertyEffect:28}</rem>
\---
Quando você inflige danos ao seu herói: Inflige {value:percentAtt,percent} de seu {%AT} ao adversário que tiver mais {%pv,plural:other}.

gameplayDescription.fr:
{PropertyEffect:28}\_: Plus vous avez mal, plus vous faites de dégâts\_!
\---
<color=#7FD5E4>{%AT}</color>\_: Votre force brute\_! Plus vous l'améliorerez, plus vous taperez fort\_!
gameplayDescription.en:
{PropertyEffect:28}: The more you hurt, the more damage you do!
\---
<color=#7FD5E4>{%AT}</color>: Your raw strength! The more you improve it, the harder you'll hit!
gameplayDescription.es:
{PropertyEffect:28}: Cuanto peor estás, más daño haces.
\---
<color=#7FD5E4>{%AT}</color>: ¡Tu fuerza bruta! Cuanto más lo mejores, ¡más fuerte golpearás!
gameplayDescription.de:
{PropertyEffect:28}: Je mehr Schmerzen du hast, desto mehr Schaden richtest du an!
\---
<color=#7FD5E4>{%AT,plural:one}</color>: Deine rohe Kraft! Je mehr du sie verbesserst, desto stärker schlägst du zu!
gameplayDescription.pt:
{PropertyEffect:28}: Quanto mais você se machuca, mais danos você inflige!
\---
<color=#7FD5E4>{%AT}</color>: Sua força bruta! Quanto mais você aprimorá-lo, mais fortes serão os seus golpes!
